charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 21:841(b)(1) - POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE METHAMPHETAMINE(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant plead guilty to Counts I, III, IV, V, VI of the Superseding Indictment and is committed to the Bureau of Prisons for 70 months on Count I and 60 months on Count III, said terms to be served consecutively; 5 years supervised release on Count I and 5 years on Count III with special conditions; said terms to run concurrently; $200 special assessment
